entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 6:12 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: NNE 37 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
